heading: Conditions We Treat
subheading: Acupuncture and Traditional Chinese Medicine can effectively address a wide range of health concerns

cards.title: Pain Management
cards.description: Muscular, bone, disc, joint disorders, headaches, migraines, and chronic pain conditions

cards.title: Fertility & Hormones
cards.description: Fertility issues, IUI/IVF support, hormonal disorders, and women's health concerns

cards.title: Stress & Sleep
cards.description: Stress management, insomnia, anxiety, depression, and emotional wellbeing

cards.title: Digestive Health
cards.description: IBS, colitis, Crohn's disease, and other gastrointestinal disorders

cards.title: Autoimmune Conditions
cards.description: Rheumatoid arthritis, ulcerative colitis, lupus, and immune system support

cards.title: Recovery & Support
cards.description: Post-surgery recovery, chemotherapy/radiation side effects, and rehabilitation

cards.title: Allergies
cards.description: Seasonal allergies, sinusitis, hay fever, and respiratory conditions

cards.title: Facial Rejuvenation
cards.description: Cosmetic acupuncture for natural, non-invasive facial rejuvenation
